review: She explained really well about the missed period due to weight changes. I will start working on that.

I went to the doctor 3 weeks back for my first pregnancy checkup ,****** **** *** *********** ***** *** I paid 7k for that and also I went 3 days continuously for those tests to the hospital in this covid-19 situation.after getting test reports the doctor didn't even saw my results simply asked the staff for mail through call she told everything is fine without giving any precautions or medicine.Hardly she is spending 2min with the people.* ***** **** *** ******** **** ** * **** ********* ** ****

as an individual i dont write much reviews . As a women going to doc to discuss any infection related symptoms is not always comfortable for most of us . she was rude the moment i entered the cabin before i sat down ... post completion of  checkup i asked why she recommended some testing the first thing she said cancer etc etc .** * *** ** ******* **** ****** *** *** ******* ***** ** ** **** ** *** ********* *** all is well.docs need to be sympathetic and choose words wisely even before any reports or testing.
**** ** ******** ***** ** ******** **** *** *** ******** ** *** ********* Told me I might  have appendix problem. Wasted my money on scans and time. Pls dont go to this doc!

review:
Super rude staff. Poor time management, always have to wait for at least an hour. They will give you an appointment time which always extends by an hour. Nurses have no accountability. 
Happy with the doctor but the management is very poor. Will never go back, *** **** * **** ****** ** ******* ****** Its not worth my time and patience.
She seem disinterested in explaining the pros and cons. Kept checking her phone while I was asking her qs. **** ***************

review: she did not even explain anything. Was very rude. Just prescribed some tablets. It did not even take more than 2 mins. After paying 800 RS as consultation fees  she was behaving as if she is treating us for free.
